Name: [Tenacity] Medical Kit
Desc: When an Agent is attacked, the DMG is <color=#2BAD00>shared between all squad members</color>, and the DMG is reduced by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>. When any off-field Agent has less than 10% HP, they will share DMG but not lose HP.
Desc2: From large items like first-aid supplies to small items like cold medications, it all fits inside.
